languages.text: {n}Инцендия удивленно поднимает бровь.{/n} "Этот приговор слишком мягок, {name}. Чего ты добьешься, забрав его к себе в услужение? Какой урок будет извлечен из подобной милости?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Инцендия удивленно поднимает бровь.{/n} "Этот приговор слишком мягок, {name}. Чего ты добьешься, забрав его к себе в услужение? Какой урок будет извлечен из подобной милости?"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia raises an eyebrow in surprise.{/n} "That sentence is too lenient, {name}. What will you gain by making him your servant? What lesson will be learned from that show of mercy?"
languages.original_text: {n}Инцендия удивленно поднимает бровь.{/n} "Этот приговор слишком мягок, {name}. Чего ты добьешься, забрав его к себе в услужение? Какой урок будет извлечен из подобной милости?"

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅惊讶地扬起了眉毛。{/n}“这样的判决太仁慈了，{name}。让他成为你的仆人，你能得到什么好处？你的仁慈能让他尝到什么教训？”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia raises an eyebrow in surprise.{/n} "That sentence is too lenient, {name}. What will you gain by making him your servant? What lesson will be learned from that show of mercy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅惊讶地扬起了眉毛。{/n}“这样的判决太仁慈了，{name}。让他成为你的仆人，你能得到什么好处？你的仁慈能让他尝到什么教训？”
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}インセンディアは驚いて眉をひそめた。{/n}「{name}、その刑は甘すぎる。奴をお前の召使にして、何の意味があるのだ？その慈悲深さから、どんな教訓が得られると？」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia raises an eyebrow in surprise.{/n} "That sentence is too lenient, {name}. What will you gain by making him your servant? What lesson will be learned from that show of mercy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアは驚いて眉をひそめた。{/n}「{name}、その刑は甘すぎる。奴をお前の召使にして、何の意味があるのだ？その慈悲深さから、どんな教訓が得られると？」
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia levanta una ceja sorprendida.{/n} «Esa sentencia es demasiado indulgente, {name}. ¿Qué ganará convirtiéndole en su siervo? ¿Qué lección aprenderá de esa muestra de misericordia?».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia raises an eyebrow in surprise.{/n} "That sentence is too lenient, {name}. What will you gain by making him your servant? What lesson will be learned from that show of mercy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia levanta una ceja sorprendida.{/n} «Esa sentencia es demasiado indulgente, {name}. ¿Qué ganará convirtiéndole en su siervo? ¿Qué lección aprenderá de esa muestra de misericordia?».
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia hebt überrascht eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Diese Strafe ist zu milde, {name}. Was gewinnt Ihr, indem Ihr ihn zu Eurem Diener macht? Welche Lektion soll dieser Akt der Gnade vermitteln?"
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia raises an eyebrow in surprise.{/n} "That sentence is too lenient, {name}. What will you gain by making him your servant? What lesson will be learned from that show of mercy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia hebt überrascht eine Augenbraue.{/n} "Diese Strafe ist zu milde, {name}. Was gewinnt Ihr, indem Ihr ihn zu Eurem Diener macht? Welche Lektion soll dieser Akt der Gnade vermitteln?"
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}Surprise, Incendia hausse un sourcil.{/n} « Vous êtes beaucoup trop {mf|indulgent|indulgente}, {name}. Qu'avez-vous à gagner en faisant de lui votre serviteur ? Quelle leçon tirera-t-il d'une telle magnanimité ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia raises an eyebrow in surprise.{/n} "That sentence is too lenient, {name}. What will you gain by making him your servant? What lesson will be learned from that show of mercy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Surprise, Incendia hausse un sourcil.{/n} « Vous êtes beaucoup trop {mf|indulgent|indulgente}, {name}. Qu'avez-vous à gagner en faisant de lui votre serviteur ? Quelle leçon tirera-t-il d'une telle magnanimité ? »
traits.speaker: Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia, şaşkınlıkla tek kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bu ceza fazla hafif {name}. Onu hizmetkârın yapmak sana ne kazandıracak? Bu merhamet gösterisinden nasıl bir ders çıkaracak?"
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia raises an eyebrow in surprise.{/n} "That sentence is too lenient, {name}. What will you gain by making him your servant? What lesson will be learned from that show of mercy?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia şaşkınlıkla tek kaşını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bu ceza fazla hafif {name}. Onu hizmetkârın yapmak sana ne kazandıracak? Bu merhamet gösterisinden nasıl bir ders alınabilir ki?"
traits.speaker: Chorda
